TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ControlDesignerState extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides access to the state of the control designer in the design host through the interface. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesignerState> class is a wrapper for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentDesignerStateService> interface, which is the interface between a designer and a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public object this[string key] { get; set; }

Docs.param: The name of the item to set or retrieve from the state collection.
Docs.summary: Represents one element, identified by the given key, in the state collection for a control designer.
